column5: I know this is off topic but upon the request of some of my fellow anglers here are a few pics from the past month. The ones of the pair of Sand Hill Cranes and the Whistling Swan are not not very clear as I was using my hand held camera forgot my tripod

Great pics!  I have a pic of a pair of Sandhills that showed up on the back trail of our place near River Valley ON, in the middle of the bush.  It was the darnedest thing, not where I’d ever expect to see that!  I’ll have to try and find it.
